title: 求一个BungeeTabListPlus 模板
txt_content:
BungeeTabListPlus-2.8.9 
竖着的魔板目前就一个登陆服和一个子服




image.png (224.07 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-3-9 21:46 上传





类似这样的稍微好看点！感谢各位大佬！

replies.author: Azitate
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Azitate 于 2020-3-13 14:22 编辑 

给一个朋友做的。。但是我不能直接分发副本，你想要的这种竖排的设置给你个参考




image.png (192.29 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-3-13 14:22 上传





components:
- !table
  columns:
    0:
    - {text: "&d&l主城世界&7[&f${playerset:lobby size}&7]", icon: "colors/green.png", ping: 0}
    - !players
      playerSet: lobby
      playerComponent: "${player name}"
      morePlayersComponent: {text: "... 共 ${other_count} 位玩家", icon: "default/players.png", ping: 0}
      minSize: 9
      maxSize: 9
    - {text: "&6&l生存世界&7[&f${playerset:sc size}&7]", icon: "colors/green.png", ping: 0}
    - !players
      playerSet: sc
      playerComponent: "${player name}"
      morePlayersComponent: {text: "... 共 ${other_count} 位玩家", icon: "default/players.png", ping: 0}
      minSize: 9
      maxSize: 9
    1:
    - {text: "&a&l家园一区&7[&f${playerset:plot size}&7]", icon: "colors/aqua.png", ping: 0}
    - !players
      playerSet: plot
      playerComponent: "${player name}"
      morePlayersComponent: {text: "... 共 ${other_count} 位玩家", icon: "default/players.png", ping: 0}
      minSize: 9
      maxSize: 9
    - {text: "&2&l资源世界&7[&f${playerset:zy size}&7]", icon: "colors/green.png", ping: 0}
    - !players
      playerSet: zy
      playerComponent: "${player name}"
      morePlayersComponent: {text: "... 共 ${other_count} 位玩家", icon: "default/players.png", ping: 0}
      minSize: 9
      maxSize: 9
    2:
    - {text: "&a&l家园二区&7[&f${playerset:plot2 size}&7]", icon: "colors/red.png", ping: 0}
    - !players
      playerSet: plot2
      playerComponent: "${player name}"
      morePlayersComponent: {text: "... 共 ${other_count} 位玩家", icon: "default/players.png", ping: 0}
      minSize: 9
      maxSize: 9
    - {text: "&2&l比赛活动&7[&f${playerset:zx size}&7]", icon: "colors/green.png", ping: 0}
    - !players
      playerSet: zx
      playerComponent: "${player name}"
      morePlayersComponent: {text: "... 共 ${other_count} 位玩家", icon: "default/players.png", ping: 0}
      minSize: 9
      maxSize: 9
    3:
    - {text: "&b&l精灵世界&7[&f${playerset:jlsj size}&7]", icon: "colors/red.png", ping: 0}
    - !players
      playerSet: jlsj
      playerComponent: "${player name}"
      morePlayersComponent: {text: "... 共 ${other_count} 位玩家", icon: "default/players.png", ping: 0} 
      minSize: 9
      maxSize: 9
    - {text: "&6&l未开放&7[&f${playerset:zx size}&7]", icon: "colors/green.png", ping: 0}
    - !players
      playerSet: zx
      playerComponent: "${player name}"
      morePlayersComponent: {text: "... and ${other_count} others", icon: "default/players.png", ping: 0}
      minSize: 9
      maxSize: 9复制代码
